Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: பெருங்கொடையான் பேணான் வெகுளி அவனின் மருங்குடையார் மாநிலத்து இல்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: No one, in all the world, will have so many relatives (about him), as he who makes large gift, and does not give way to anger.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A great leader stands at the center of a vast, global gathering of people. He is depicted as immensely generous, with rivers of gifts ('பெருங்கொடையான்') flowing from him to the diverse crowd.
Layered_Composition.Midground: His face is a mask of perfect calm and serenity; he does not get angry ('பேணான் வெகுளி'). A shadowy beast of anger is shown trying to approach him but dissolving before it can touch him.
Layered_Composition.Background: The crowd of relatives and supporters around him is so vast that it seems to encompass the entire world ('மாநிலத்து'), showing that no one has more supporters than him.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The person who is both magnanimously generous and completely free from anger will have the largest following of kinsmen and supporters in the world.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The rivers of gifts represent great generosity. The dissolving beast of anger represents mastery over wrath. The world-spanning crowd symbolizes his unparalleled number of supporters.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Magnanimous, serene, universally loved, powerful, unmatched.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A brilliant, almost divine light radiates from the leader, illuminating the global crowd. The colors are epic, diverse, and celebratory.

Technical_Cues.Camera: An ultra-wide, epic shot that captures the leader and the immense, worldwide scale of his following.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, cinematic, with thousands of detailed figures.

Cultural_Anchors: The largest following in the world.

Flux_Optimized_Prompt.Negative_Prompt: stingy leader, angry leader, small crowd, text artifacts, cartoonish.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the diverse crowd.
